title: The Sword of God: A Post-Apocalyptic Survival Thriller (I call him HIM trilogy Book 3) : The End of Time
description: The chilling words haunt Jacob and his companions as they remain trapped in the depths of Hell. Was their sacrifice enough to reveal the Sword of God?And on the surface, the dead have risen to the call of their demon masters. Friends and surprising allies prepare for the Final War for humanity, but will their fight be enough to prevent extinction?Author Scott W. Kimak brings an end to his climactic trilogy in this breathtaking, action-packed, page-turner.
author: Scott W. Kimak
